xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 29 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <BogdanVancea1_> has joined #medsavant 11:13 <BogdanVancea> has joined #medsavant 11:13 <BogdanVancea> hello everyone :) 11:14 <sdumitriu> Hey BogdanVancea 11:15 <BogdanVancea> hey, sdumitriu? how are you? 11:15 <sdumitriu> Good, you? 11:15 <BogdanVancea> pretty good, just came back from school 11:16 <BogdanVancea> I need to check for new commits on Medsavant 11:16 <BogdanVancea> I can't seem to be able to run the client in a different ide than netbeans 11:17 <sdumitriu> I think it needs a MainClass entry 11:17 <sdumitriu> Plus the classpath 11:17 <BogdanVancea> are you using netbeans aswell? 11:17 <sdumitriu> No 11:17 <sdumitriu> Eclipse 11:17 <BogdanVancea> I've seen some .iml files 11:18 <sdumitriu> Those are Idea 11:18 <BogdanVancea> in the svn repo 11:18 <BogdanVancea> yeah, I'm also using idea 11:18 <sdumitriu> I've never tried it 11:18 <BogdanVancea> I've been converted from eclipse a few months ago 11:18 <BogdanVancea> has better suport for vcs (imo) 11:19 <BogdanVancea> and its a lot faster than eclipse on linux 11:19 <BogdanVancea> but its a matter of taste, in the end 11:19 <BogdanVancea> :) 11:20 <BogdanVancea> btw, would you like the scrum meetings to be more formal? 11:20 <BogdanVancea> as in, should I clearly state, yesterday I did x, tomorrow I'm doing y 11:20 <BogdanVancea> ? 11:21 <sdumitriu> No, they don't need to be formal 11:21 <sdumitriu> But it helps you to organize your ideas better 11:21 <BogdanVancea> okay 11:22 <BogdanVancea> well, they'll probably get more formal once I actually start coding 11:22 <BogdanVancea> sincer I'll probably encounter problems 11:23 <BogdanVancea> btw, can you recommend me some material for reading about dna, chromosomes, genomes, variants, etc? 11:23 <BogdanVancea> or is wikipedia fine? 11:25 <sdumitriu> Wikipedia should do fine for the moment 11:25 <sdumitriu> Let me see if I can get you something better 11:26 <BogdanVancea> okay 11:38 <sdumitriu> Nope, WP should do fine 11:39 <BogdanVancea> ok :) 12:26 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 17:21 <BogdanVancea> well, I'm going to bed 17:21 <BogdanVancea> good night 17:21 <BogdanVancea> :) 17:58 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 21:50 <phenotips_org> has joined #medsavant
